title: Bible Stories for Children #4 - MP3 version
description:
Bible Stories (Dramatized) for children.  To purchase the tapes or CDs, please visit the following website: <a href=" http://yourstoryhour.org/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://yourstoryhour.org/</a>

This is the MP3 format.


This is the fourth series which contain the following stories:

The Daring Act.  Queen Esther saves her people.	

The Land of Uz.  Job is tested for his faithfulness.	

The Charming Prince.  Nebuchadnezzar becomes king of Babylon and he takes Jews captive from Jerusalem, including Daniel and his three friends.	

The Four Friends.  Daniel and his three friends are taken to Babylon.  Their first test of faithfulness to God comes in the area of diet.	

In the King's Court.  King Nebuchadnezzar has a dream but can not remember the dream.  His advisers are of no help but God gives Daniel the same dream and the interpretation.	

The Fiery Affair at Dura.  Shadrach, Meschach and Abednego are thrown into the fiery furnace.	

Seven Years a Beast.  Nebuchadnezzar loses his mind after forsaking God.	

The Bloodless Hand.  God's judgment comes during Belshazzar's drunken feast.	

The Lions and the Villains.  Daniel in the lion's den.	

The Man Who Ran From God.  The story of Jonah and the whale.	

Mary of Nazareth.  This story presents the birth of Jesus, and the events just prior to the Savior's birth.	

Born Under a Star.  Events surrounding the birth of Jesus.	

The King Grows Up.  Jesus childhood at home.	

A Voice in the Desert.  John the Baptist's preaching and Jesus' baptism.	

Journey to Jerusalem.  First cleansing of the temple, and Jesus visits with Nicodemus and the woman at the well.	

Happiness in Galilee.  Miracle of Jesus	

Jesus the Healer.  Jesus heals a leper and the paralytic let down through the roof.	

Matthew's Magnificent Party.   Matthew is called by Jesus to be a disciple.	

Troubled Waters.  Jesus heals on the Sabbath.	

Road to Happiness.  The ordination of the 12 disciples and healing of the Roman officer's servant.	

The Greatest Miracle.  The stories of the resurrection of the widow's son, Simon's feast and a demon cast out.	

Prisoner in a Dungeon.  The death of John the Baptist.	

Stormy Times.  Jesus calms the storm, heals Jairus' daughter and cast out demons from the two demoniacs.	

A Boy's Amazing Lunch -  Jesus feeds 5,000 with a small boy's lunch.  A Fisherman Who Couldn't Swim - Peter walks on water.
